<static_pages><static_page/><static_page url="https://www.marriottvacationclub.com/news-press-releases/2018/02/Marriotts_Frenchmans_Cove_in_St_Thomas_Reopens_After_Recovery_Efforts_from_Hurricanes_Irma_and_Maria.shtml" template="newsroom/newsroom-detail" permalink="newsroom/2018-02/marriotts_frenchmans_cove_in_st_thomas_reopens_after_recovery_efforts_from_hurricanes_irma_and_maria" title="Newsroom: Marriott&#39;s Frenchman&#39;s Cove in St. Thomas Reopens After Recovery Efforts from Hurricanes Irma and Maria
"><page_data><p>
 <b>
  ORLANDO, Fla. – February 16, 2018
 </b>
 – The associates at Marriott&#39;s Frenchman&#39;s Cove located in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands are excited to welcome back Owners and guests to this exceptional resort today. The resort has been closed since Hurricane Irma hit St. Thomas on September 6, 2017. Marriott&#39;s Frenchman&#39;s Cove is one of the first large resorts on St. Thomas to open after recovering from the aftermath of two extremely powerful Category 5 hurricanes, Irma and Maria.
</p>
<p>
 Associates at Marriott&#39;s Frenchman&#39;s Cove have been working hand-in-hand with the remediation company and other local vendors to return the resort to its original splendor all while dealing with their own personal challenges. The associates take such pride in the resort, and they want to ensure Owners and guests have a wonderful vacation experience when they return to St. Thomas. Upon reopening today, Owners and guests are able to enjoy the pool and hot tub, the beach has been cleared and is open for use, the pier is fully restored, the restaurant and Marketplace are open and operating and the resort activities department is operating normally. Crews will continue to work on landscaping and other projects, including building painting, throughout the resort over the next several weeks. Additionally, The Frenchman&#39;s Reef &amp; Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort remains closed due to hurricane damage until further notice.
</p>
<p>
 &#34;The unwavering dedication of our associates has shown through during this challenging time at Marriott&#39;s Frenchman&#39;s Cove,&#34; said Scott Derrickson, general manager. &#34;I am so proud of the hard work our associates took on and completed to get the resort back open even though they were also affected personally by these storms. We are grateful to be welcoming our first Owners and guests back to the resort today.&#34;
</p>
<p>
 The island of St. Thomas continues to go through a lengthy recovery process. Many restaurants and shops have reopened for business and much of the foliage has made an incredible recovery. Local vendors throughout the island are thrilled to see one of the larger resorts reopening and are eager to be welcoming back visitors to the island. Multiple agencies and organizations have come together to restore St. Thomas, and progress updates are posted regularly by local officials. Visit
 <a href="http://informusvi.com">
  http://informusvi.com
 </a>
 for the latest information regarding island infrastructure progress, curfews, local business updates, airport status and electric power restoration.
</p>
<p>

</p>

</p>

</pdf><excerpt>ORLANDO, Fla. – February 16, 2018 
 – The associates at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove located in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands are excited to welcome back Owners and guests to this exceptional resort today. The resort has been closed since Hurricane Irma hit St. Thomas on September 6, 2017. Marriott's Frenchman's Cove is one of the first large resorts on St. Thomas to open after recovering from the aftermath of two extremely powerful Category 5 hurricanes, Irma and Maria. 
Associates at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove have been working hand-in-hand with the remediation company and other local vendors to return the resort to its original splendor all while dealing with their own personal challenges. The associates take such pride in the resort, and they want to ensure Owners and guests have a wonderful vacation experience when they return to St. Thomas. Upon reopening today, Owners and guests are able to enjoy the pool and hot tub, the beach has been cleared and is open for use, the pier is fully restored, the restaurant and Marketplace are open and operating and the resort activities department is operating normally. Crews will continue to work on landscaping and other projects, including building painting, throughout the resort over the next several weeks. Additionally, The Frenchman's Reef & Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort remains closed due to hurricane damage until further notice.
"The unwavering dedication of our associates has shown through during this challenging time at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove," said Scott Derrickson, general manager. "I am so proud of the hard work our associates took on and completed to get the resort back open even though they were also affected personally by these storms. We are grateful to be welcoming our first Owners and guests back to the resort today."
The island of St. Thomas continues to go through a lengthy recovery process. Many restaurants and shops have reopened for business and much of the foliage has made an incredible recovery. Multiple agencies and organizations have come together to restore St. Thomas, and progress updates are posted regularly by local officials. Visit

"><page_data><p>
 <strong>
  ORLANDO, Fla. – January 18, 2018 -
 </strong>
 Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens—Marriott Vacation Club’s all-new vacation ownership escape—is now open on the island of Bali.  The stunning tropical retreat, where moments of relaxation meet island inspiration, is the company’s first resort in Indonesia.
</p>
<p>
 The setting couldn’t be more extraordinary: Condé Nast ranks Bali as one of the best islands in the world and TripAdvisor has called Bali the world’s favorite destination.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club continues to add exciting new vacation destinations in Asia and the Pacific. Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens joins Marriott’s Phuket Beach Club and Marriott’s Mai Khao Beach in Phuket, Thailand, Marriott Vacation Club at the Empire Place© in Bangkok and Marriott Vacation Club at Surfers Paradise in Gold Coast, Australia.
</p>
<p>
 Nestled within the exclusive Nusa Dua community, Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens features spacious 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom and studio guestrooms each with kitchenettes, their design inspired by the vivid tropical beauty of Indonesia. The resort shares convenient access* to the amenities and activities at the adjacent Courtyard by Marriott Bali Nusa Dua resort, including on-site dining, fitness center, luxury spa and Kids Club, as well as access to a private beach club at Nusa Dua Beach. Close to the new resort are numerous cultural attractions, boutique shops and an eclectic, world-class food scene.
</p>
<p>
 Known as the “Island of the Gods,” Bali is home to world-class surfing and diving and a serene, spiritual attitude framed by turquoise waters, spectacular beaches and gently curving coastlines.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club’s Owners, Members and nightly guests alike will find Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens the ideal base for discovering the exotic charm, experience and legendary beauty of Bali.
</p>
<p>
 <strong>
  For more information about nightly room rates and to book a stay at the all-new Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens, visit
  <a href="//www.marriottvacationclub.com" target="_blank">
   MarriottVacationClub.com
  </a>
  or
  <a href="//www.vacationclubap.com" target="_blank">
   VacationClubAP.com
  </a>
  .
 </strong>
</p>
<p>
 <strong>
  Marriott Vacation Club Members and Owners may also contact their Vacation Ownership Advisor to make reservations now for immediate arrivals.
 </strong>
</p>
<p>

 </a>
 and find us on Facebook at

  Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub
 </a>
 .
</p>

  Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation
 </a>
 (NYSE: VAC) for company information.
</p>
<p>
 *Access to hotel amenities and activities is subject to change.
</p>

</title><date>June 27, 2017

</date><pdf>/news-press-releases/2017/06/Marriott_Vacations_Worldwide_Awarded_Gold_Stevie.pdf
</pdf><excerpt>To read the full press release, please visit:
Marriott Vacations Worldwide Awarded Gold Stevie at the 2017 American Business Awards
</excerpt><permalink>newsroom/2017-06/marriott_vacations_worldwide_awarded_gold_stevie</permalink></static_page><static_page url="https://www.marriottvacationclub.com/news-press-releases/2017/06/Marriotts_Bali_Nusa_Dua_Gardens_Now_Taking_Reservations.shtml" template="newsroom/newsroom-detail" permalink="newsroom/2017-06/marriotts_bali_nusa_dua_gardens_now_taking_reservations" title="Newsroom: Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens – Now Taking Reservations Resort will be first Marriott Vacation Club property in Indonesia
"><page_data><p>
 <strong>
  ORLANDO, Fla. – June 1, 2017 –
 </strong>
 Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens—a new resort from Marriott Vacation Club—is expected to open January 1, 2018 in Bali, Indonesia. This island paradise, known for its incredible diversity and geographical wonders of ancient temples and palaces, is also home to world-class surfing and diving and a serene attitude framed by turquoise waters and curving coastlines. TripAdvisor recently called Bali the world&#39;s favorite destination.
</p>
<p>
 Reservations can be made now by guests, Members and Owners for arrivals beginning January 1, 2018.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club currently has three spectacular properties in Southeast Asia, including Marriott&#39;s Phuket Beach Club and Marriott&#39;s Mai Khao Beach, both in Phuket, Thailand, and Marriott Vacation Club at the Empire Place© in Bangkok, Thailand. The planned addition of Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens continues the company&#39;s growth strategy of adding new locations to its collection of properties and resorts in Asia.
</p>
<p>
 Nestled within the Nusa Dua beachside community, Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens will feature 51 spacious 1- and 2-bedroom apartments, their design inspired by the vivid tropical beauty of Indonesia.  The new resort is also expected to share convenient access to amenities and activities* featured at the adjacent 5-star hotel, the Courtyard by Marriott Bali Nusa Dua, including on-site dining, lagoon-style pool and lazy river, fitness center and spa as well as access to private beach club amenities at Nusa Dua beach.
</p>
<p>
 The distinctive Bali National Golf Club is just minutes away, as is boutique shopping and eclectic dining featuring cuisines both regional and far-flung. The world&#39;s finest surfing, snorkeling and diving are also all nearby.
</p>
<p>
 Exploring the island, guests quickly discover why Bali is considered a top destination. Inland, towering volcanoes are wrapped in pristine forests and magnificent temples and centuries-old pagodas emerge from the highlands. The island&#39;s famous beaches range from the striking black sand found along the northern and western coasts, to the white shores of Kuta and Nusa Dua. The coves at Uluwatu and Padang Padang are nearly hidden by cliffs and with a little exploring, travelers uncover many of the island&#39;s lesser-known, &#34;secret&#34; beaches including one with its own secret treasure: A gorgeous waterfall.
</p>
<p>
 Nightly guests or Members and Owners, families or couples, novice travelers or those with globetrotting experience will find Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens the ideal home base for discovering the exotic charm and legendary beauty of Bali.
</p>
<p>
 For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens, visit
 <a href="http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/DSPMV-mvc-bali/?mktcmp=mvcrentalcmd">
  marriottvacationclub.com/bali
 </a>
 .
</p>
<p>
 Members and Owners may make reservations for Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens now for arrivals beginning January 1, 2018, through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations® Exchange Program as an anticipated exchange option. This affiliation and occupancy are subject to Marriott Vacation Club completing its purchase of Marriott&#39;s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens.
</p>
<p>
 * Access to hotel amenities and activities is subject to change
</p>
<p>

</excerpt><permalink>newsroom/2017-06/marriotts_bali_nusa_dua_gardens_now_taking_reservations</permalink></static_page><static_page url="https://www.marriottvacationclub.com/news-press-releases/2017/05/Discover_Paradise_Inspired-Marriotts_Waikoloa_Ocean_Club.shtml" template="newsroom/newsroom-detail" permalink="newsroom/2017-05/discover_paradise_inspired-marriotts_waikoloa_ocean_club" title="Newsroom: Discover Paradise Inspired Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club is Now Open on Hawaii&#39;s Big Island
"><page_data><p>
 <strong>
  ORLANDO, Fla. – May 8, 2017 –
 </strong>
 Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club, overlooking beautiful &#39;Anaeho&#39;omalu Bay, is now open on the western shore of Hawaii&#39;s Big Island. Inspired by the island&#39;s lush green flora, pristine waterfalls, fiery red volcanos and black lava beds, the resort&#39;s beautifully decorated one- and two-bedroom suites celebrate the rich culture and diverse landscape of this one-of-a-kind island.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club shares amenities and activities featured by the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort &amp; Spa, including swimming pools, with one just for the kids, a fitness center, tennis facilities, lei-making classes and hula and ukulele lessons. Plenty of upscale shopping and dining are all within walking distance, and nearby on the Kohala Coast two championship golf courses test the skills of all levels.
</p>
<p>
 Those looking for a calming sanctuary and a place to recharge their batteries will find relaxing and rejuvenating treatments inspired by eastern and western cultures at the Mandara Spa, located within the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort &amp; Spa. A signature treatment is the Hawaiian Lomi Lomi massage, the traditional healing massage of Hawaiian royalty.
</p>
<p>
 Of course, no vacation to the Big Island—or to Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club—would be complete without an authentic Polynesian luau featuring food, dancing and music under the star-filled sky, at the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort &amp; Spa.
</p>
<p>
 Beyond the resort and its on-site beach, adventure awaits. Trails through a lush rainforest can be explored on foot or horseback, and ancient lava tubes and black sand beaches take the breath away. If sights are set even higher, amazing discoveries can be found near active volcanos or the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea, considered one of the best sites in the world for stargazing.
</p>
<p>
 Beaches on Hawaii&#39;s Big Island are usually less crowded and offer a wide variety of recreational options. Guests can snorkel through the calm, crystal-clear waters at Hōnaunau Bay or learn to surf at surf schools and beginner wave spots along the Kona coast.
</p>
<p>
 Whether it&#39;s the call of adventure or the promise of a rejuvenating escape, an excursion with the family or a dreamy south Pacific getaway for two, Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club is the ideal destination to become immersed in the rich culture of Hawaii and experience life in paradise. Aloha!
</p>
<p>
 Reservations can be made now for immediate arrivals. For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott&#39;s Waikoloa Ocean Club, visit

</page_data><title>Discover Paradise Inspired Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club is Now Open on Hawaii's Big Island
</title><date> May 8, 2017 

</date><pdf>/news-press-releases/2017/05/Discover_Paradise_Inspired-Marriotts_Waikoloa_Ocean_Club.pdf
</pdf><excerpt>ORLANDO, Fla. – May 8, 2017 –
 Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club, overlooking beautiful 'Anaeho'omalu Bay, is now open on the western shore of Hawaii's Big Island. Inspired by the island's lush green flora, pristine waterfalls, fiery red volcanos and black lava beds, the resort's beautifully decorated one- and two-bedroom suites celebrate the rich culture and diverse landscape of this one-of-a-kind island.
Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club shares amenities and activities featured by the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, including swimming pools, with one just for the kids, a fitness center, tennis facilities, lei-making classes and hula and ukulele lessons. Plenty of upscale shopping and dining are all within walking distance, and nearby on the Kohala Coast two championship golf courses test the skills of all levels.
Those looking for a calming sanctuary and a place to recharge their batteries will find relaxing and rejuvenating treatments inspired by eastern and western cultures at the Mandara Spa, located within the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa. A signature treatment is the Hawaiian Lomi Lomi massage, the traditional healing massage of Hawaiian royalty.
Of course, no vacation to the Big Island—or to Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club—would be complete without an authentic Polynesian luau featuring food, dancing and music under the star-filled sky, at the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa.
Beyond the resort and its on-site beach, adventure awaits. Trails through a lush rainforest can be explored on foot or horseback, and ancient lava tubes and black sand beaches take the breath away. If sights are set even higher, amazing discoveries can be found near active volcanos or the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea, considered one of the best sites in the world for stargazing. 
Beaches on Hawaii's Big Island are usually less crowded and offer a wide variety of recreational options. Guests can snorkel through the calm, crystal-clear waters at Hōnaunau Bay or learn to surf at surf schools and beginner wave spots along the Kona coast.
Whether it's the call of adventure or the promise of a rejuvenating escape, an excursion with the family or a dreamy south Pacific getaway for two, Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club is the ideal destination to become immersed in the rich culture of Hawaii and experience life in paradise. Aloha!
Reservations can be made now for immediate arrivals. For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club, visit 
MarriottVacationClub.com
.
For Owners, reservations for Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club can be made through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations
®
 Exchange Program as an exchange option.

"><page_data><p>
 <strong>
  SAN
 </strong>
 <strong>
  DIEGO
 </strong>
 –
 <strong>
  July
 </strong>
 <strong>
  1,
 </strong>
 <strong>
  2016
 </strong>
 – A completely reimagined urban vacation escape, Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is excited to open its doors. San Diego’s newest downtown destination is a wonderful blend of historic ambiance, contemporary design and Marriott Vacation Club service and hospitality.
</p>
<p>
 Inspired by San Diego’s famous Gaslamp Quarter, the luxuriously appointed king, double and connecting two-room suites feature refined wood, metal finishes, sofa beds and stunning views of the city. Rooms are being thoroughly remodeled in phases and more than 50 rooms — on floors 25 through 27, providing some of the best views of San Diego and beyond — are now available.
</p>
<p>
 The property also has a fitness center, an activity and play room, an indoor pool and “Shake,” an on-site bar and lounge.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is a sophisticated, comfortable setting and a perfect home base for Southern California vacations or getaways. It’s a place to unwind from a day of shopping, exploring the museums of Balboa Park or visiting the legendary San Diego Zoo. It’s a place to recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife, restaurants and Gaslamp Quarter.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is one of the company’s five city-centric properties that showcase an exciting extension to the Marriott Vacation Club brand. The unique destinations in New York City, Boston, Washington, D.C., South Beach and now San Diego embrace the spirit and culture of their urban locations, creating an authentic sense of place while delivering easy access to local interests, attractions and transportation. Marriott Vacation Club Pulse locations put Owners and guests right in the action, in the city and neighborhoods of each destination.
</p>
<p>
 All Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties are taking reservations for immediate arrivals, allowing for welcome summer-in-the-city weekends, incredible vacations or even a few days away spent exploring a favorite city.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego also features an all-new sales gallery where guests discover how they can enjoy a lifetime of vacation experiences.  Using reclaimed wood, metal accents, and brick walls and floors, architects designed the area to echo the eclectic industrial detailing found in the Gaslamp Quarter. The gallery has a vibrant, open feel, created by generous use of sliding glass wall systems. High-tech touches include massive flat-screen TVs and directional speakers that provide an intimate audio experience.
</p>

<p>
 <strong>
  ORLANDO, Fla. – March 31, 2016
 </strong>
 – Marriott Vacation Club, a global leader in vacation ownership and brand segment of Marriott Vacations Worldwide (NYSE:VAC), announced today that Owners and guests can make reservations at its newest property, Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego, through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations
 <sup>
  TM
 </sup>
 Exchange Program for arrivals beginning July 1.
</p>
<p>
 Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego will soon be newly renovated and a totally reimagined vacation escape that greets Owners and guests with a perfect blend of historic ambiance and contemporary design. Inspired by San Diego’s renowned Gaslamp Quarter, the 264 well-appointed king, double and connecting two-room suites feature refined wood, metal finishes, sofa beds and stunning San Diego views. The property also has a fitness center, activity and play room and an indoor pool. Renovation of the kids club, indoor pool and fitness area, all common areas and 54 rooms is anticipated to be finished by July 1.
</p>
<p>
 It’s a unique, sophisticated setting to unwind from a day of exploration at the museums of Balboa Park or visiting the legendary San Diego Zoo. It’s a place to recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife.
</p>
<p>
 The famous Gaslamp Quarter, just a short stroll away, transforms at night into a sophisticated cosmopolitan playground where locals and visitors alike take advantage of fine dining, craft cocktails, live theater, music, and dancing. Later, guests kick back California-style at the property’s Shake lounge, located on the 12th floor. Shake is the central hub of the property and offers a full-service bar, signature cocktails, and light fare. It’s the ideal location to finish one day and plan the next.
</p>
<p>
 With world-class attractions, arts, culture, cuisine and nightlife at your doorstep, Owners and guests will never run out of things to do while visiting one of California’s most celebrated coastal cities. Whatever the desire while in San Diego, let curiosity be the guide, discovery be the agenda, and Marriott Vacation Club be the host.
</p>
<p>
 The Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego joins new Marriott Vacation Club locations in New York City and Miami’s South Beach, each available through the Marriott Vacations Club Destinations Exchange Program and Interval International as an exchange option.
</p>
<p>
 To make reservations and get more information, go to
 <a href="http://www.marriottvacationclub.com/">
  MarriottVacationClub.com
 </a>
 .
</p>
<p>

</p>

ORLANDO, Fla. – March 31, 2016
 – Marriott Vacation Club, a global leader in vacation ownership and brand segment of Marriott Vacations Worldwide (NYSE:VAC), announced today that Owners and guests can make reservations at its newest property, Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego, through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations
TM
 Exchange Program for arrivals beginning July 1.
Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego will soon be newly renovated and a totally reimagined vacation escape that greets Owners and guests with a perfect blend of historic ambiance and contemporary design. Inspired by San Diego’s renowned Gaslamp Quarter, the 264 well-appointed king, double and connecting two-room suites feature refined wood, metal finishes, sofa beds and stunning San Diego views. The property also has a fitness center, activity and play room and an indoor pool. Renovation of the kids club, indoor pool and fitness area, all common areas and 54 rooms is anticipated to be finished by July 1.
It’s a unique, sophisticated setting to unwind from a day of exploration at the museums of Balboa Park or visiting the legendary San Diego Zoo. It’s a place to recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife.
The famous Gaslamp Quarter, just a short stroll away, transforms at night into a sophisticated cosmopolitan playground where locals and visitors alike take advantage of fine dining, craft cocktails, live theater, music, and dancing. Later, guests kick back California-style at the property’s Shake lounge, located on the 12th floor. Shake is the central hub of the property and offers a full-service bar, signature cocktails, and light fare. It’s the ideal location to finish one day and plan the next.
With world-class attractions, arts, culture, cuisine and nightlife at your doorstep, Owners and guests will never run out of things to do while visiting one of California’s most celebrated coastal cities. Whatever the desire while in San Diego, let curiosity be the guide, discovery be the agenda, and Marriott Vacation Club be the host.
The Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego joins new Marriott Vacation Club locations in New York City and Miami’s South Beach, each available through the Marriott Vacations Club Destinations Exchange Program and Interval International as an exchange option.
To make reservations and get more information, go to 
MarriottVacationClub.com
.
More about Marriott Vacation Club’s new location in San Diego:
With world-class attractions, arts, culture, cuisine and nightlife at the doorstep, families will never run out of things to do and discover while staying at Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego.
About Marriott Vacation Club
 
Marriott Vacation Club
 is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of 58 resorts and more than 12,100 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is an upscale vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences. For more information, please visit 
www.MarriottVacationClub.com
. For nightly rentals, visit 
www.Marriott.com
. Follow us on Twitter at 
www.twitter.com/MarriottVacClub
 and find us on Facebook at 
www.facebook.com/marriottvacationclub
.

 (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

static_page.title: Newsroom
Newsroom: Marriott's Frenchman's Cove in St. Thomas Reopens After Recovery Efforts from Hurricanes Irma and Maria
static_page.page_data:
ORLANDO, Fla. – February 16, 2018 – The associates at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove located in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands are excited to welcome back Owners and guests to this exceptional resort today. The resort has been closed since Hurricane Irma hit St. Thomas on September 6, 2017. Marriott's Frenchman's Cove is one of the first large resorts on St. Thomas to open after recovering from the aftermath of two extremely powerful Category 5 hurricanes, Irma and Maria.

Associates at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove have been working hand-in-hand with the remediation company and other local vendors to return the resort to its original splendor all while dealing with their own personal challenges. The associates take such pride in the resort, and they want to ensure Owners and guests have a wonderful vacation experience when they return to St. Thomas. Upon reopening today, Owners and guests are able to enjoy the pool and hot tub, the beach has been cleared and is open for use, the pier is fully restored, the restaurant and Marketplace are open and operating and the resort activities department is operating normally. Crews will continue to work on landscaping and other projects, including building painting, throughout the resort over the next several weeks. Additionally, The Frenchman's Reef & Morning Star Marriott Beach Resort remains closed due to hurricane damage until further notice.

"The unwavering dedication of our associates has shown through during this challenging time at Marriott's Frenchman's Cove," said Scott Derrickson, general manager. "I am so proud of the hard work our associates took on and completed to get the resort back open even though they were also affected personally by these storms. We are grateful to be welcoming our first Owners and guests back to the resort today."

The island of St. Thomas continues to go through a lengthy recovery process. Many restaurants and shops have reopened for business and much of the foliage has made an incredible recovery. Local vendors throughout the island are thrilled to see one of the larger resorts reopening and are eager to be welcoming back visitors to the island. Multiple agencies and organizations have come together to restore St. Thomas, and progress updates are posted regularly by local officials. Visit http://informusvi.com for the latest information regarding island infrastructure progress, curfews, local business updates, airport status and electric power restoration.

About Marriott Vacation Club Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of 60 resorts and more than 12,000 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe, Asia and Australia. Marriott Vacation Club is a premium vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences. Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .

Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

###

Jacqueline V. Ader-Grob, Marriott Vacation Club
jacqueline.ader-grob@vacationclub.com
(407) 513-6950

static_page.title: Newsroom: MARRIOTT VACATION CLUB IS NOW OPEN ON THE ISLAND OF BALI
static_page.page_data:
ORLANDO, Fla. – January 18, 2018 - Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens—Marriott Vacation Club’s all-new vacation ownership escape—is now open on the island of Bali. The stunning tropical retreat, where moments of relaxation meet island inspiration, is the company’s first resort in Indonesia.

The setting couldn’t be more extraordinary: Condé Nast ranks Bali as one of the best islands in the world and TripAdvisor has called Bali the world’s favorite destination.

Marriott Vacation Club continues to add exciting new vacation destinations in Asia and the Pacific. Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens joins Marriott’s Phuket Beach Club and Marriott’s Mai Khao Beach in Phuket, Thailand, Marriott Vacation Club at the Empire Place© in Bangkok and Marriott Vacation Club at Surfers Paradise in Gold Coast, Australia.

Nestled within the exclusive Nusa Dua community, Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens features spacious 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom and studio guestrooms each with kitchenettes, their design inspired by the vivid tropical beauty of Indonesia. The resort shares convenient access* to the amenities and activities at the adjacent Courtyard by Marriott Bali Nusa Dua resort, including on-site dining, fitness center, luxury spa and Kids Club, as well as access to a private beach club at Nusa Dua Beach. Close to the new resort are numerous cultural attractions, boutique shops and an eclectic, world-class food scene.

Known as the “Island of the Gods,” Bali is home to world-class surfing and diving and a serene, spiritual attitude framed by turquoise waters, spectacular beaches and gently curving coastlines.

Marriott Vacation Club’s Owners, Members and nightly guests alike will find Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens the ideal base for discovering the exotic charm, experience and legendary beauty of Bali.

For more information about nightly room rates and to book a stay at the all-new Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Gardens, visit MarriottVacationClub.com or VacationClubAP.com .

Marriott Vacation Club Members and Owners may also contact their Vacation Ownership Advisor to make reservations now for immediate arrivals.

About Marriott Vacation Club Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of 60 resorts and more than 12,000 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe, Asia and Australia. Marriott Vacation Club is a premium vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences. Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .

Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

*Access to hotel amenities and activities is subject to change.

###

Media contact:
Nick Gollattscheck, Marriott Vacation Club
Nick.Gollattscheck@VacationClub.com
407.456.1662

static_page.title: Newsroom: Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens – Now Taking Reservations Resort will be first Marriott Vacation Club property in Indonesia
static_page.page_data:
ORLANDO, Fla. – June 1, 2017 – Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens—a new resort from Marriott Vacation Club—is expected to open January 1, 2018 in Bali, Indonesia. This island paradise, known for its incredible diversity and geographical wonders of ancient temples and palaces, is also home to world-class surfing and diving and a serene attitude framed by turquoise waters and curving coastlines. TripAdvisor recently called Bali the world's favorite destination.

Reservations can be made now by guests, Members and Owners for arrivals beginning January 1, 2018.

Marriott Vacation Club currently has three spectacular properties in Southeast Asia, including Marriott's Phuket Beach Club and Marriott's Mai Khao Beach, both in Phuket, Thailand, and Marriott Vacation Club at the Empire Place© in Bangkok, Thailand. The planned addition of Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens continues the company's growth strategy of adding new locations to its collection of properties and resorts in Asia.

Nestled within the Nusa Dua beachside community, Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens will feature 51 spacious 1- and 2-bedroom apartments, their design inspired by the vivid tropical beauty of Indonesia. The new resort is also expected to share convenient access to amenities and activities* featured at the adjacent 5-star hotel, the Courtyard by Marriott Bali Nusa Dua, including on-site dining, lagoon-style pool and lazy river, fitness center and spa as well as access to private beach club amenities at Nusa Dua beach.

The distinctive Bali National Golf Club is just minutes away, as is boutique shopping and eclectic dining featuring cuisines both regional and far-flung. The world's finest surfing, snorkeling and diving are also all nearby.

Exploring the island, guests quickly discover why Bali is considered a top destination. Inland, towering volcanoes are wrapped in pristine forests and magnificent temples and centuries-old pagodas emerge from the highlands. The island's famous beaches range from the striking black sand found along the northern and western coasts, to the white shores of Kuta and Nusa Dua. The coves at Uluwatu and Padang Padang are nearly hidden by cliffs and with a little exploring, travelers uncover many of the island's lesser-known, "secret" beaches including one with its own secret treasure: A gorgeous waterfall.

Nightly guests or Members and Owners, families or couples, novice travelers or those with globetrotting experience will find Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens the ideal home base for discovering the exotic charm and legendary beauty of Bali.

For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens, visit marriottvacationclub.com/bali .

Members and Owners may make reservations for Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens now for arrivals beginning January 1, 2018, through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations® Exchange Program as an anticipated exchange option. This affiliation and occupancy are subject to Marriott Vacation Club completing its purchase of Marriott's Bali Nusa Dua Gardens.

* Access to hotel amenities and activities is subject to change

About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of more than 55 resorts and more than 12,000 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is a premium vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences.  Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .

Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

static_page.title: Newsroom: Discover Paradise Inspired Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club is Now Open on Hawaii's Big Island
static_page.page_data:
ORLANDO, Fla. – May 8, 2017 – Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club, overlooking beautiful 'Anaeho'omalu Bay, is now open on the western shore of Hawaii's Big Island. Inspired by the island's lush green flora, pristine waterfalls, fiery red volcanos and black lava beds, the resort's beautifully decorated one- and two-bedroom suites celebrate the rich culture and diverse landscape of this one-of-a-kind island.

Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club shares amenities and activities featured by the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, including swimming pools, with one just for the kids, a fitness center, tennis facilities, lei-making classes and hula and ukulele lessons. Plenty of upscale shopping and dining are all within walking distance, and nearby on the Kohala Coast two championship golf courses test the skills of all levels.

Those looking for a calming sanctuary and a place to recharge their batteries will find relaxing and rejuvenating treatments inspired by eastern and western cultures at the Mandara Spa, located within the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa. A signature treatment is the Hawaiian Lomi Lomi massage, the traditional healing massage of Hawaiian royalty.

Of course, no vacation to the Big Island—or to Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club—would be complete without an authentic Polynesian luau featuring food, dancing and music under the star-filled sky, at the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa.

Beyond the resort and its on-site beach, adventure awaits. Trails through a lush rainforest can be explored on foot or horseback, and ancient lava tubes and black sand beaches take the breath away. If sights are set even higher, amazing discoveries can be found near active volcanos or the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea, considered one of the best sites in the world for stargazing.

Beaches on Hawaii's Big Island are usually less crowded and offer a wide variety of recreational options. Guests can snorkel through the calm, crystal-clear waters at Hōnaunau Bay or learn to surf at surf schools and beginner wave spots along the Kona coast.

Whether it's the call of adventure or the promise of a rejuvenating escape, an excursion with the family or a dreamy south Pacific getaway for two, Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club is the ideal destination to become immersed in the rich culture of Hawaii and experience life in paradise. Aloha!

Reservations can be made now for immediate arrivals. For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club, visit MarriottVacationClub.com .

For Owners, reservations for Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club can be made through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations ® Exchange Program as an exchange option.

About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of more than 55 resorts and more than 12,000 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is a premium vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences.  Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .

Of course, no vacation to the Big Island—or to Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club—would be complete without an authentic Polynesian luau featuring food, dancing and music under the star-filled sky, at the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa. Beyond the resort and its on-site beach, adventure awaits. Trails through a lush rainforest can be explored on foot or horseback, and ancient lava tubes and black sand beaches take the breath away. If sights are set even higher, amazing discoveries can be found near active volcanos or the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea, considered one of the best sites in the world for stargazing. Beaches on Hawaii's Big Island are usually less crowded and offer a wide variety of recreational options. Guests can snorkel through the calm, crystal-clear waters at Hōnaunau Bay or learn to surf at surf schools and beginner wave spots along the Kona coast. Whether it's the call of adventure or the promise of a rejuvenating escape, an excursion with the family or a dreamy south Pacific getaway for two, Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club is the ideal destination to become immersed in the rich culture of Hawaii and experience life in paradise. Aloha! Reservations can be made now for immediate arrivals. For information about room rates or to book a stay at Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club, visit MarriottVacationClub.com . For Owners, reservations for Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club can be made through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations ® Exchange Program as an exchange option. About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of more than 55 resorts and more than 12,000 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is a premium vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences. static_page.title: Newsroom: In the Heart of the City: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego Is Now Open
static_page.page_data:
SAN DIEGO – July 1, 2016 – A completely reimagined urban vacation escape, Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is excited to open its doors. San Diego’s newest downtown destination is a wonderful blend of historic ambiance, contemporary design and Marriott Vacation Club service and hospitality.

Inspired by San Diego’s famous Gaslamp Quarter, the luxuriously appointed king, double and connecting two-room suites feature refined wood, metal finishes, sofa beds and stunning views of the city. Rooms are being thoroughly remodeled in phases and more than 50 rooms — on floors 25 through 27, providing some of the best views of San Diego and beyond — are now available.

The property also has a fitness center, an activity and play room, an indoor pool and “Shake,” an on-site bar and lounge.

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is a sophisticated, comfortable setting and a perfect home base for Southern California vacations or getaways. It’s a place to unwind from a day of shopping, exploring the museums of Balboa Park or visiting the legendary San Diego Zoo. It’s a place to recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife, restaurants and Gaslamp Quarter.

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is one of the company’s five city-centric properties that showcase an exciting extension to the Marriott Vacation Club brand. The unique destinations in New York City, Boston, Washington, D.C., South Beach and now San Diego embrace the spirit and culture of their urban locations, creating an authentic sense of place while delivering easy access to local interests, attractions and transportation. Marriott Vacation Club Pulse locations put Owners and guests right in the action, in the city and neighborhoods of each destination.

All Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties are taking reservations for immediate arrivals, allowing for welcome summer-in-the-city weekends, incredible vacations or even a few days away spent exploring a favorite city.

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego also features an all-new sales gallery where guests discover how they can enjoy a lifetime of vacation experiences.  Using reclaimed wood, metal accents, and brick walls and floors, architects designed the area to echo the eclectic industrial detailing found in the Gaslamp Quarter. The gallery has a vibrant, open feel, created by generous use of sliding glass wall systems. High-tech touches include massive flat-screen TVs and directional speakers that provide an intimate audio experience.

For reservations, information and to learn about affordable rentals at the new Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties, go to MVCPulse.com .

About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of more than 55 resorts and more than 12,100 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is an upscale vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences.

Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub . Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

###

static_page.title: Newsroom: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse – Bringing Guests Closer to the Heart of It All
static_page.page_data:
ORLANDO, Fla. - April 27, 2016 - There’s a difference between visiting a place and truly experiencing it, between seeing its sights and discovering its secrets, between walking its streets and feeling its pulse.  It’s a difference Marriott Vacation Club Pulse SM begins initially in the heart of five vibrant cities.

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, an exciting extension to the Marriott Vacation Club ® brand, features unique properties that embrace the spirit and culture of their urban locations, creating an authentic sense of place while delivering easy access to local interests, attractions and transportation.

The guestrooms and suites at Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties echo the cosmopolitan nature of their surroundings, each with an updated, modern look and feel that reflects the personal energy and unique culture of their host cities. Because the action is found outside the property—in the city and the neighborhoods—the guestrooms and suites are designed for shorter, more active stays.

Most Marriott Vacation Club Pulse locations also have connecting rooms and kitchenettes, making them great options for larger parties and guests who may want a bit more room during their city-centric vacation or getaway.

“Our Owners and guests are eager to explore new places and try new experiences, especially those in more urban locations,” said Stephen P. Weisz, president and chief executive officer of Marriott Vacations Worldwide. “Marriott Vacation Club Pulse expands vacation choices into even more destinations, all with a very unique style. Now, our guests can truly immerse themselves in the cultures, local scenes and neighborhoods of their favorite cities.”

Each property was chosen for its central location in the heart of the action:

Perfect for spring-in-the-city weekends, incredible vacations or even quick getaways spent exploring the city, Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties in Boston, Washington, D.C., South Beach and New York City are now taking reservations for immediate arrivals (Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is currently taking reservations for arrivals beginning on July 1).

For reservations, information and to learn about affordable rentals at the new Marriott Vacation Club Pulse properties, Owners and guests can visit MVCPulse.com .

About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of more than 55 resorts and more than 12,100 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is an upscale vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences.  Follow us on Twitter at Twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at Facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .
Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

static_page.title: Newsroom: Marriott Vacation Club – Now in Historic, Happening San Diego
static_page.page_data:
Download High-Res Image

ORLANDO, Fla. – March 31, 2016 – Marriott Vacation Club, a global leader in vacation ownership and brand segment of Marriott Vacations Worldwide (NYSE:VAC), announced today that Owners and guests can make reservations at its newest property, Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego, through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations TM Exchange Program for arrivals beginning July 1.

Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego will soon be newly renovated and a totally reimagined vacation escape that greets Owners and guests with a perfect blend of historic ambiance and contemporary design. Inspired by San Diego’s renowned Gaslamp Quarter, the 264 well-appointed king, double and connecting two-room suites feature refined wood, metal finishes, sofa beds and stunning San Diego views. The property also has a fitness center, activity and play room and an indoor pool. Renovation of the kids club, indoor pool and fitness area, all common areas and 54 rooms is anticipated to be finished by July 1.

It’s a unique, sophisticated setting to unwind from a day of exploration at the museums of Balboa Park or visiting the legendary San Diego Zoo. It’s a place to recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife.

The famous Gaslamp Quarter, just a short stroll away, transforms at night into a sophisticated cosmopolitan playground where locals and visitors alike take advantage of fine dining, craft cocktails, live theater, music, and dancing. Later, guests kick back California-style at the property’s Shake lounge, located on the 12th floor. Shake is the central hub of the property and offers a full-service bar, signature cocktails, and light fare. It’s the ideal location to finish one day and plan the next.

With world-class attractions, arts, culture, cuisine and nightlife at your doorstep, Owners and guests will never run out of things to do while visiting one of California’s most celebrated coastal cities. Whatever the desire while in San Diego, let curiosity be the guide, discovery be the agenda, and Marriott Vacation Club be the host.

The Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego joins new Marriott Vacation Club locations in New York City and Miami’s South Beach, each available through the Marriott Vacations Club Destinations Exchange Program and Interval International as an exchange option.

To make reservations and get more information, go to MarriottVacationClub.com .

More about Marriott Vacation Club’s new location in San Diego:

With world-class attractions, arts, culture, cuisine and nightlife at the doorstep, families will never run out of things to do and discover while staying at Marriott Vacation Club, San Diego.

About Marriott Vacation Club
Marriott Vacation Club is a global leader in vacation ownership with a diverse portfolio of 58 resorts and more than 12,100 timeshare villas throughout the U.S., Caribbean, Europe and Asia. Marriott Vacation Club is an upscale vacation ownership program that provides Owners and their families with the flexibility to enjoy high-quality vacation experiences. For more information, please visit www.MarriottVacationClub.com . For nightly rentals, visit www.Marriott.com . Follow us on Twitter at www.twitter.com/MarriottVacClub and find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/marriottvacationclub .

Visit Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: VAC) for company information.

###
